scripts.lint: jshint *.js bin/*js configs/*.js email-templates/*.js lib/*.js lib/bedrock/*.js lib/bedrock/tests/*.js locales/*.js schemas/*.js site/static/en/app/*.js site/static/en/app/controllers/*.js site/static/en/app/directives/*.js site/static/en/app/filters/*.js site/static/en/app/services/*.js site/static/en/legacy/*.js test/*.js
scripts.ci-lint: mkdir -p reports && jshint --reporter=checkstyle *.js bin/*js configs/*.js email-templates/*.js lib/*.js lib/bedrock/*.js lib/bedrock/tests/*.js locales/*.js schemas/*.js site/static/en/app/*.js site/static/en/app/controllers/*.js site/static/en/app/directives/*.js site/static/en/app/filters/*.js site/static/en/app/services/*.js site/static/en/legacy/*.js test/*.js > reports/jshint.xml || exit 0
scripts.coverage: mkdir -p reports && rm -rf lib-cov; ./node_modules/visionmedia-jscoverage/jscoverage lib lib-cov && BEDROCK_COV=1 node test.js > reports/coverage.html && rm -rf lib-cov
scripts.install-selenium: test ! -e ./temp/sv-selenium/selenium-server-standalone.jar && ./node_modules/.bin/install_selenium; test ! -e ./temp/sv-selenium/chromedriver && ./node_modules/.bin/install_chromedriver; ln -sf ./temp/sv-selenium/chromedriver .; echo 'Selenium and chromedriver have been successfully installed.'
